explains: v. 动员，组织；调动，调用；动员（士兵、军队等）参战；帮助（某物更轻松地）移动；使流动；使松动

sentences.en: The troops were ordered to mobilize.
If you could mobilize the resources, you could get it done.
sentences.cn: 如果你能调动资源，你就能完成它。

sentences.en: He helped energize and mobilize millions of people around the nation.
sentences.cn: 他参与激励并动员了全国数百万人。
